t: Daft Punk - Daft Club [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: Daft Club is a remix album by Daft Punk. Some of the songs were already placed on their Discovery album, for example, Aerodynamics, which is a song that they have been remixed and rearranged with its order. The overall style of the album lines in parallel with those of their previous efforts.

t: Daft Punk - Homework: Amazon.nl: CDs & Vinyl
s: The item came as it was brand new, sealed and new covers/sleeve. The vinyl itself was dusty, creasy? and there were hearable surface scratches. I believe it is a new product but the handling of the vinyl goes very wrong. This is the second try to get a good version, the other was from a local store. It has the same faults and i returned it.
